alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued July 09 at 11:06AM EDT until July 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Strong south to north longshore current developing this afternoon. * WHERE...In South Carolina, Coastal Horry and Coastal Georgetown Counties. In North Carolina, Coastal Pender and Coastal New Hanover Counties. * WHEN...Through this evening. * IMPACTS...Longshore currents can sweep swimmers and surfers into rip currents, piers, jetties, and other hazardous areas. It may sweep swimmers off their feet, making it difficult to return to shore.
info.instruction: Caution should be used when in or near the water. Check with lifeguards before entering the ocean for possible hazards you may be swept into.
